name: Crazy Gorilla Teeth Doctor - Doctor Game for Family
name_original: Crazy Gorilla Teeth Doctor - Doctor Game for Family
description:
Gorilla Dentist and Doctor is an exciting addition to our doctor and surgeon series designed for kids, toddler babies and girls. where you will become dental surgeon for these cute zoo animals treating their dental injuries and broken teeth.
These poor little zoo animals are waiting for pet dental surgeon to treat them. They have badly injured their selves in zoo and it’s time for animal dentist and doctor surgeon to rescue them. Treat their tooth injuries so they can get relief from tooth ache and smile like a sparking star.
